arts.ttl: Monaco vs. Man City: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Man City face Monaco for the first time since Pep Guardiola’s maiden season at the helm.

arts.ttl: Man City Predicted Lineup vs. Monaco: Bernardo Starts at Former Home
arts.sum: Bernardo Silva is returning to Monaco for the first time since making the move to Manchester in 2017.

arts.ttl: Bernardo Silva unsure if new-look Man City ready for biggest titles as Rodri returns for Monaco game
arts.sum: Manchester City captain Bernardo Silva believes it’s too early to say if his team can be a contender for the biggest trophies this season. I would like to give you an answer but the reality is in the last six months a lot of things have changed,” Silva said Tuesday, a day before City’s Champions League match at his former club Monaco.

arts.ttl: Rodri availability confirmed, fresh Cherki update from Guardiola before Monaco vs. Man City
arts.sum: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola provides the latest injury update on Rodri and Rayan Cherki ahead of Wednesday's Champions League clash with Monaco.

arts.ttl: Man City XI vs Monaco: Confirmed team news, predicted lineup, injury latest for Champions League
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola facing big selection call for Man City’s second fixture in this season’s league phase of the Champions League

arts.ttl: Monaco vs Manchester City predictions: Citizens to win thrilling affair
arts.sum: Monaco have been involved in some high-scoring games this season and Joe Casey is expecting more of the same when they host Manchester City in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Adi Hutter provides AS Monaco injury update ahead of Manchester City tie
arts.sum: AS Monaco face Manchester City on Wednesday night in the UEFA Champions League. They will do so having to manage a long injury list. Monaco’s midfield is heavily depleted. Adi…

arts.ttl: Major Man City injury boost as two players return to training before Monaco trip
arts.sum: Manchester City supporters receive a positive update on the fitness of two first-team stars ahead of Wednesday’s Champions League trip to Monaco.

arts.ttl: Man City’s “clearly improving” Rodri alternative praised before Monaco “three-pointers”
arts.sum: A “clearly improving” Manchester City players is a “safe and cautious” alternative to injured star Rodri for Wednesday’s Champions League trip to Monaco, Citizens expert Steven McInerney tells Sports Mole.

arts.ttl: Monaco vs Man City: Prediction, kick-off time, TV, live stream, team news, h2h results, odds
arts.sum: Manchester City travel to Monaco on matchday two of the Champions League on Tuesday night.
